# Background {.unnumbered}

Databrary is designed by and for researchers.
This section aims to provide researchers guidance about how to use Databrary.

A common first step is to determine your status as a researcher.
See [the About Databrary section for details](../background/who-why.qmd#whats-my-status)
Then, you can request authorization as described in the next chapter.
